title: Which occurs if USD depreciates against JPY

content.question: If the international value of the United States dollar depreciates in comparison with the Japanese yen, which of the following is most likely to occur?

choices.label: United States exports to Japan will increase.
The United States government will increase the tariff on Japanese imports.
The United States balance-of-trade deficit with Japan will become even larger.
United States tourists can be expected to visit Japan in greater numbers.
Trade between the United States and Japan will not be affected.

content.answer: United States exports to Japan will increase.
